# Compliance Trestle Claude Code Plugin

A [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code) plugin for managing OSCAL compliance packages using [Compliance Trestle](https://oscal-compass.dev/compliance-trestle) — a CNCF sandbox project for machine-readable compliance documentation following the [NIST OSCAL](https://pages.nist.gov/OSCAL/) standard.

## Installation

### From Marketplace

```bash
# Add the marketplace source
/plugin marketplace add ethanolivertroy/compliance-trestle-claude-plugin

# Install the plugin
/plugin install compliance-trestle@compliance-trestle-claude-plugin
```

### Manual

Clone this repo and copy the plugin into your Claude Code plugins directory:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/ethanolivertroy/compliance-trestle-claude-plugin.git
cp -R compliance-trestle-claude-plugin/plugins/compliance-trestle ~/.claude/plugins/
```

## Prerequisites

- **Python 3.9+**
- **compliance-trestle** pip package:
  ```bash
  pip install compliance-trestle
  ```
- **Claude Code** CLI installed and configured

## What's Included

### Slash Commands (25)

#### Workspace Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/compliance-trestle:init` | Initialize a new Compliance Trestle workspace |
| `/compliance-trestle:status` | Show the status of the current Trestle workspace |
| `/compliance-trestle:validate` | Validate OSCAL models in the Trestle workspace |

#### Model Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/compliance-trestle:assemble` | Assemble a split OSCAL model into a single file in dist/ |
| `/compliance-trestle:create` | Create a new OSCAL model in the workspace |
| `/compliance-trestle:describe` | Describe the structure and contents of an OSCAL model |
| `/compliance-trestle:import` | Import an existing OSCAL document into the workspace |
| `/compliance-trestle:merge` | Merge split OSCAL sub-components back into their parent file |
| `/compliance-trestle:replicate` | Replicate (copy/rename) an OSCAL model in the workspace |
| `/compliance-trestle:split` | Split an OSCAL model into smaller sub-component files |

#### Author Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/compliance-trestle:catalog-generate` | Generate markdown from an OSCAL catalog for editing |
| `/compliance-trestle:catalog-assemble` | Assemble edited catalog markdown back into OSCAL JSON |
| `/compliance-trestle:component-generate` | Generate markdown from an OSCAL component definition |
| `/compliance-trestle:component-assemble` | Assemble edited component markdown back into OSCAL JSON |
| `/compliance-trestle:profile-generate` | Generate markdown from an OSCAL profile for editing |
| `/compliance-trestle:profile-assemble` | Assemble edited profile markdown back into OSCAL JSON |
| `/compliance-trestle:profile-inherit` | Generate an inheritance view from a profile and leveraged SSP |
| `/compliance-trestle:profile-resolve` | Resolve a profile to produce a flattened catalog |
| `/compliance-trestle:ssp-generate` | Generate SSP markdown from a profile and optional component definitions |
| `/compliance-trestle:ssp-assemble` | Assemble SSP markdown into an OSCAL System Security Plan JSON |
| `/compliance-trestle:ssp-filter` | Filter an SSP by profile or components |

#### Workflow Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/compliance-trestle:catalog-roundtrip` | Full catalog authoring workflow — generate, edit, and assemble |
| `/compliance-trestle:component-roundtrip` | Full component definition authoring workflow |
| `/compliance-trestle:profile-roundtrip` | Full profile authoring workflow — generate, edit, and assemble |
| `/compliance-trestle:ssp-roundtrip` | Full SSP authoring workflow — generate, edit, and assemble |

### Agents (4)

| Agent | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| **compliance-reviewer** | Reviews OSCAL compliance workspace for completeness, gaps, missing implementation responses, and validation errors |
| **control-mapper** | Maps and traces controls across OSCAL models — catalogs, profiles, component definitions, and SSPs |
| **ssp-author** | Interactive assistant for writing SSP implementation responses, explaining control requirements, and suggesting compliant language |
| **workspace-explorer** | Explores and explains the structure of a Trestle workspace — model inventory, relationships, and content summaries |

### Skills (4)

| Skill | Activates On |
|-------|-------------|
| **trestle-workspace** | Questions about workspace structure, initialization, directory conventions |
| **trestle-oscal-models** | Questions about OSCAL model types, relationships, catalogs, profiles, SSPs |
| **trestle-authoring-workflow** | Questions about the generate-edit-assemble cycle, markdown authoring |
| **trestle-control-implementation** | Questions about writing control responses, rules, parameters, inheritance |

## Usage Examples

```bash
# Initialize a trestle workspace
/compliance-trestle:init

# Import an OSCAL catalog
/compliance-trestle:import https://raw.githubusercontent.com/usnistgov/oscal-content/main/nist.gov/SP800-53/rev5/json/NIST_SP-800-53_rev5_catalog.json nist-800-53-rev5

# Generate SSP markdown for authoring
/compliance-trestle:ssp-generate my-profile --compdefs my-component

# Full roundtrip workflow
/compliance-trestle:ssp-roundtrip my-profile --compdefs my-component

# Check workspace status
/compliance-trestle:status

# Validate all models
/compliance-trestle:validate --all
```

## Links

- [Compliance Trestle Documentation](https://oscal-compass.dev/compliance-trestle)
- [NIST OSCAL Standard](https://pages.nist.gov/OSCAL/)
- [OSCAL Compass Project](https://oscal-compass.dev/)
- [Compliance Trestle on GitHub](https://github.com/oscal-compass/compliance-trestle)

# compliance-trestle

Claude Code plugin for managing OSCAL compliance packages using [Compliance Trestle](https://oscal-compass.dev/compliance-trestle).

## Overview

This plugin provides slash commands, agents, and skills for the full Compliance Trestle workflow — from initializing workspaces and importing OSCAL content through the generate-edit-assemble authoring cycle.

## Components

- **25 slash commands** — workspace management, model operations, authoring, and roundtrip workflows
- **4 agents** — compliance reviewer, control mapper, SSP author, workspace explorer
- **4 skills** — auto-invoked knowledge for workspace structure, OSCAL models, authoring workflows, and control implementation

## Requirements

- Python 3.9+
- `pip install compliance-trestle`

## Quick Start

```bash
/compliance-trestle:init
/compliance-trestle:import <catalog-url> <model-name>
/compliance-trestle:ssp-generate <profile> --compdefs <component>
/compliance-trestle:status
```

## Links

- [Compliance Trestle Docs](https://oscal-compass.dev/compliance-trestle)
- [NIST OSCAL](https://pages.nist.gov/OSCAL/)
- [Plugin Marketplace README](../../README.md)
